__e: She was blasted back by something inside me, by... By... By magic.
I know, But I don't want her to get rejected by Ben and then rejected by me.
Do you really think she's ready to be rejected by her mother all over again?
But he threw ME out and I Was gone for 16 years.
It will always be an outcast and so alone that it is less afraid of people than its black brethren.
Okay, I'm not used to being rejected, and apparently I'm not very good at it, but I'm pretty sure that we have chemistry, so what gives?
